document_data.name: Vilcuum
document_data.mainbody: '''Vilcuum''' was a [[mind flayer]] in [[Ryxyg]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Assault on Maerimydra|19-20}}
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Vilcuum was one of the mind flayers who joined the allied attack on [[Maerimydra]]. With the support of an adventuring party, Vilcuum fought an [[aboleth]] named [[Nevik'Dethig]] and his [[orc]] minions at the [[Lake of Blood]].
